Articles.Content: I love doing IVA missions and I fell in love with all the cool stuff in the ALCOR capsule. I would love to see that stuff be available in the other capsules as well.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Google the RPM mod, this is exactly what you're looking for.
I have RPM but the ALCOR capsule has additional stuff and really cool control panels.

It would require IVA designers to put stuff in the other capsules. Even then, most of them will just be prop and not as interactive as ALCOR (have you ever try activating the emergency electricity generator? it actually works and will consume monoprop to create EC, that is how awesome ALCOR is).

There were [Many props](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/500/ManyProps) and [Modified IVA](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/252/Modified%20IVA) that both uses those props for buttons and panels in other IVA, but they are for 0.90. May or may not work now.
Alex (The creator of ALCOR) is supposedly working on adding his ALCOR props to the stock IVA's. Though, he takes a long time to complete stuff so don't expect much.

Alex already placed ALCOR props in MK1-2 pod, he haven't released it yet. I started populating stock pods with props, however, with the latest release of RPM, ALCOR props need an update to the latest code.

*It was me who placed the RPM monitors in new cockpits of KSP 1.0*

- - - Updated - - -

I'm curious which of the ALCOR props you like the most? Which of them are the most useful?

Many pods just don't have enough space in them to place everything and I have to choose.
